title: Pulsating Dreamscape
description: An immersive audio-visual experience that generates dynamic, evolving landscapes based on sound input and mathematical algorithms.

fullDescription.content: Pulsating Dreamscape is an immersive audio-visual experience that generates dynamic, evolving landscapes based on sound input and mathematical algorithms. The project creates a synesthetic experience where sound and visuals are intrinsically linked, each influencing and responding to the other.

Built with Three.js and Web Audio API, Pulsating Dreamscape analyzes audio input in real-time, extracting frequency data and amplitude information. This data drives the generation and manipulation of 3D geometries, creating a constantly evolving visual landscape that pulses and transforms in response to sound.
